department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.ch:
1. 學習 Linux Kernel 的原理
2. 培養撰寫,修改 Kernel Code 的能力
goal.en:
1. Learn the principle of Linux Kernel
2. Learn to modify or write Linux Kernel Code

outline.ch:
1) Intel x86 Architecture and Real Mode v.s. Protected Mode
2) BIOS
3) Memory Addressing
4) Process
5) Interrupts and Exceptions
6) Kernel Synchronization
7) Timing Measurements.
8) Memory Management
9) Process Address Space
10) System Calls.

1) Intel x86 Architecture and Real Mode v.s. Protected Mode
2) BIOS
3) Memory Addressing
4) Process
5) Interrupts and Exceptions
6) Kernel Synchronization
7) Timing Measurements.
8) Memory Management
9) Process Address Space
10) System Calls.
